sentence.Network_en: Here again the psalmist speaks of God's boundless loving - kindness and mercy.
sentence.Network_cn: (十七节)作诗的人,在这里,重新又说到那无边无涯的慈爱和怜悯.

sentence.Network_en: David the psalmist did not head a multinational corporation.
sentence.Network_cn: 诗人大卫并不是跨国企业的领袖,但他治理著一个国家.

sentence.Network_en: Music that Luther sang to the sacred words of the Psalmist.
sentence.Network_cn: 是路德以赞美诗作者神圣的词句唱出的音乐.

PerfectNetExp.abs: psalm 圣歌psalmist 赞美诗作者-

list.abs: if the psalmist were not David , he may have been a Levite who continually studied and copied the Law , a scribe as was Ezra .如果这一诗篇的作者不是大卫，他就是一位不断研习及抄录律法的利未人，像以斯拉那样的文士。
the psalmist also remembers the national blessings of the Lord , which are His righteousness and just judgments for all who are oppressed ( 103 : 6 ) .诗人也记住耶和华赐给他国家的福气，就是耶和华施行公义，为一切受压迫的伸冤（103：6)。
All the praises that the psalmist offers to God are because of His greatness ., 诗人献给上帝的所有赞美都是由于上帝的伟大.

with these thoughts of God's goodness in mind , the psalmist begins to praise Him for the abundant kindness and wonderful deeds that He has done for those who trust in Him .由于我们明白这些有关上帝良善的思想，大卫开始赞美祂、感谢祂为那些信靠祂的人所作的奇事及所赐的恩慈。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from late Latin psalmista, from psalmus 'song sung to harp music' (see psalm)

sentences.sentence: "David is called The Psalmist because he is believed to be the author of the Book of Psalms"

auth_sentence.content: Now the psalmist seems to say that, if the heavens speak anything, it is not language but possibly only a highly visual silence.
auth_sentence.res_content: Now the psalmist seems to say that, if the heavens speak anything, it is not language but possibly only a highly visual silence.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Now the psalmist seems to say that, if the heavens speak anything, it is not language but possibly only a highly visual silence.

auth_sentence.content: Before the mountains were born, the psalmist says, you not were but are God.
auth_sentence.res_content: Before the mountains were born, the psalmist says, you not were but are God.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Before the mountains were born, the psalmist says, you not were but are God.
